physical_examinations.vital_signs: Height: 187 cm; Upper to lower segment ratio: 0.85; Height at 39 years old: 190 cm
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Eunuchoid body proportions and genu valgum were present.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Height increased from 187 cm (31 years old) to 190 cm (39 years old).

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Bilateral necrosis of femoral heads detected by x-ray.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: No modifications in bilateral established necrosis of femoral heads recorded thereafter.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: BMD: 0.933 g/cm2; Serum testosterone: Normal range; Serum estradiol: Undetectable; Serum LH: 5.6 mIU/mL; Serum FSH: 17.1 mIU/mL.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Unfused distal femoral and proximal tibial epiphyses; diffuse demineralization observed.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: BMD increased to 1.051 g/cm2; Serum testosterone decreased to 21 ng/dL; Serum estradiol increased to 97 pg/mL; Serum LH decreased to 0.8 mIU/mL; Serum FSH decreased to 1.0 mIU/mL.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Evident increase in estradiol levels above normal, testosterone levels below normal.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: BMD reached maximum value of 1.275 g/cm2; Serum testosterone returned to normal range; Serum estradiol decreased to 24 pg/mL; Serum LH returned to normal at 3.1 mIU/mL; Serum FSH slightly above normal.
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Epidphal closure achieved at distal femoral and proximal tibial epiphyses.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: BMD decreased to 1.029 g/cm2; Serum testosterone: 573.6 ng/dL; Serum estradiol: 15 pg/mL; Serum LH: 8.4 mIU/mL; Serum FSH: 14.8 mIU/mL.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: BMD decrease noted from 1.275 g/cm2 (phase 3) to 1.029 g/cm2 (phase 4), showing a decline in increase from baseline.
